title: ProgPair
detail: A platform that streamlines the process of open-source contributions, effectively lowering barriers to entry in tech and ensuring accessibility for individuals across various roles

title: Microsoft OpenHack: Modern Data Warehousing
detail: Designed, implemented, and operationalized a multi-source data warehouse solution from a mess of 40+ disparate sources into a single location. Deployed and transformed 2,000,000+ rows of customer data to generate reports mandated by business owner.

title: Gamify
detail: CS554 group project, a marketplace for gamers to discover, buy, and sell games. Users can real-time message between buyers and sellers to discuss and bargain products.

title: Marvel Character Collection
detail: CS554 Lab, a website to collect and display Marvel characters. Users can search for their favorite Marvel characters and view their details. Users can also add and remove characters from their collection.

title: Workout Web App
detail: CS546 group project, a social workout web app that allows users to create, share, like, and comment on each others' workout templates and profiles. Users can search or sort by popularity and muscle group.

title: Stevens Vanguard
detail: CS545 group project, a website for Stevens Institute of Technology students to review and report violations of the Stevens Honor System. Streamlines the reporting process and view updates on your ticket status.

title: Language Learning Chrome Extension
detail: A google chrome extension that helps users learn a new language by translating random words on a webpage to the language they are learning.

title: Petal and Aura
detail: A website for a bouquet shop that sells flowers based on the occasion. Users can add and remove bouquets to a wishlist and review the shop.

title: AS Software
detail: A website to display products and testimonials of a leading provider of ultrasound reporting and image management. Customers can contact and find a partner at AS Software

title: Vehicle Safety Features Demo
detail: CS 347 project, a program to model a testing environment for AI self-driving vehicles with safety features. Users can test the vehicle's performance in various scenarios.

title: Etch-A-Sketch
detail: A browser version of something between a sketchpad and an Etch-A-Sketch. Users can draw on the screen with their mouse and clear the screen.

title: Weather App
detail: A mobile app for IOS and Android development that display weather data including forecasts and nowcasts. Unique icons for each type of weather.
